post:
I'm looking for a low-cost and low-spec (except diskspace!) VPS. 

Something like:
*RAM: 256MB - 512MB
*Bandwidth: 500GB
*Diskspace: 500GB +

Location doesn't matter. OpenVZ/KVM/Whatever. Cost is more important. Bonus points for minimal debian template.

It will be used for a personal backup server, 1-3 users at most. 

Anyone have any good leads/offers?
